include

and can route it to multiple domains if
you like now the question that you might
have in mind is like why do I need to
set up a data pipeline in front of my
open search domain and the reasons to do
that are really threefold firstly and
most importantly it can help you achieve
some cost savings these pipelines can
help you de-duplicate data that is
flowing through those pipelines filter
them sample them and that can help you
optimize your storage costs the data
pipelines can also be used to Route data
lower cost storage options and that's
another cost saving strategy that you
might be able to employ
secondly it really helps you ensure data
quality so you can enforce standards you
can normalize the data you can adopt
some schemas and having a common schema
across all of your data sources is
really valuable to help you accelerate
your problem resolution times when
you're investigating issues that might
be happening in your operating
environment
and third uh it is it's a really
important aspect in helping you achieve
your privacy objectives so you can
redact or obfuscate sensitive data
especially if it's personally
identifiable information that you need
to manage carefully you can also control

Data prepper so this is a quick
